emitter_arg.out_uri: Create a Cloud Storage bucket and put its URI here.

gcloud.build_runtime_image: False by default, whether to build new Docker image for runtime dependencies (only necessary when dependencies change)
gcloud.runtime_image_name: Name for runtime Docker image (overwrites old image of same name in Artifact Registry if build_runtime_image is True)
gcloud.build_wcm_image: False by default, whether to build new Docker image for whole cell model (needed when changes are made to model code)
gcloud.wcm_image_name: Name for whole cell model Docker image (overwrites old image of same name in Artifact Registry if build_wcm_image is True)
